name: Schizonaut II
description:
Schizonaut II is an extremely fast paced horror survival arcade game filled with a sinister & liminal late night ambience that will constantly have you at the edge of your seat . take on rogue gangs of the streets with the weapon of your choosing whilst avoiding the deadly Schizonaut (an indestructible figure constructed of consciousness and the dark depths of ones imagination) the goal is to survive as long as possible .

(Single Player) (External File Support) (Windows)
